page.title: List of Xbox Game Studios video games

revision.comment: Added Xbox Series X to CrossfireX
revision.text:
{{short description|Wikipedia list article}} {{Use American English|date=February 2019}} {{Use mdy dates|date=February 2019}} [[Xbox Game Studios]] (formerly Microsoft Games, Microsoft Game Studios and Microsoft Studios) is an American [[video game publisher]] that acts as a division of technology company [[Microsoft]]. The division was created in March 2000 and replaced Microsoft's internal Games Group. This is a list of games that were published by Microsoft through the Games Group and, later, through Xbox Game Studios.
